EnemyInfo.Name: Ninja Space Pirate (Tourian)
EnemyInfo.Description:
Space Pirate that throws claws and can somersault and dive kick. The Special->Extended Tilemap should be True.
Even though this enemy shares the same AI as the "Metal" pirate, it does not share the same 5x drops and invulnerability. The AI checks the enemy ID to determine if it should have these properties.
The checks can be editted at: $B2:8780, $B2:87AA, $B2:87CF, $B2:8845

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Description: Which direction to be initially facing.

Property.Name: Travel Range
Property.Description: Distance in front of the enemy to move. After doing a jump, it will run to the edge of its range and turn around.
